publications.title: Generation of two induced pluripotent stem cell lines from a patient with recessive inherited retinal disease caused by compound heterozygous mutations in SNRNP200 gene

genomic_modifications.description: Patient-derived compound heterozygous variants in SNRNP200 (c.1792C>T and c.3341T>C).
genomic_modifications.genotype: Compound heterozygous for SNRNP200 c.1792C>T and c.3341T>C

genomic_characterisation.summary: Digital karyotyping (Illumina Beadchip SNP array and CNV analysis) at passage 9 demonstrated a normal 46,XX karyotype with no reprogramming-induced alterations detected.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal iPSC Reprogramming Plasmid kit (SC900A-1, System Biosciences)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
Sir Charles Gairdner Hospital Human Research Ethics Committee
